name: Blue3DS
tagline: Downloadable Primary Homebrew Exploits For the Nintendo 3DS/N3DS/2DS
body:
# Blue3DS
Welcome to Blue3ds (Blue3D). Here I have made a list of already-made homebrew primary exploits.
I will only display PRIMARY Exploits. These exploits can be used on an un-exploited system. Keep an eye
on this page just in case a new exploit rolls right in. You can check out [3dbrew](https://3dbrew.org/). They have
Secondary Exploits you can use. All the exploits will run on the **LATEST FIRMWARE**. Scroll all the way down
for the credits.


# Primary Exploits
Can be used on an un-exploited system. 

               
**BasicSPLOIT**                   
 Author: MrNbaYoh               [Download](http://mrnbayoh.github.io/basicsploit/)   

**Freakyhax**                      
Author: plutooo                [Download](http://plutooo.github.io/freakyhax/) 

**smashbroshax**                   
Author: Yellows8               [Download](https://github.com/yellows8/3ds_smashbroshax)


# Other Homebrew Loaders
Other loaders or installers that can be used to run one of the exploits.

**FaekInstall**                    Author: [kelsom/MrFake](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkmZVT52S2SalkZ_iFYutOw) 

[Download](https://kelsom.github.io/FaekhAx/)


# Credits
Credits to kelsom ( me ) for creating this page. Click [Here](youtube.com/channel/UCkmZVT52S2SalkZ_iFYutOw) For my YouTube.
Credits to Smea for making the homebrew possible. Check out his page [Here](https://smealum.github.io/3ds/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
